name: DRAGOT
description:
is a fast paced, top down, dungeon crawling action-rpg with roguelike elements in which every death is a lesson on how to move forward. Progress through six distinct areas, collecting game changing items, leveling up and learning how to best fight each enemy you encounter along the way. Mix item effects together for game-breaking combinations or force your way through on your skill alone, all the while being hunted by one of the four unique dragons that mysteriously pursue the player.



Move as fast as you can move your mouse to dodge, slash and shoot your way through over 200 hand-made arenas. Battle rats, spiders, ents, fire elementals, living skeletons and more.

Features



  • 4 playable characters, each with their own unique abilities and stat progressions

  • 66 different items, most adding completely new ways to play

  • 33 distinct enemy types, each with their own behaviors and abilities

  • 6 challenging boss battles

  • Over 200 handcrafted rooms to fight through

  • Player Achievements, World Encyclopedia, Secrets and more!!!
